description:
Are you looking for investors? It's not as easy as people make it out to be is it...

Do you have an opportunity that you want to pursue or the next BIG thing that just needs a handful of investors with some faith? 

Maybe you have a small but growing business and its time to take it to the next level?

Have you already tried to raise money but havenâ€™t locked in your investor yet?  How long has it taken so far? A week, a month, a year?

or are you standing still, scratching you head, wondering how to even start?

Funding Academy Express will take you through the funding process - from start to finish and answer your key questions and get you moving you towards finding your ideal investor and successful funding.

If you want to develop a plan you can start following right away to get your own ideal investor - then Funding Academy Express is the course for you.  Sign up now.

(NOTE: As you go through the course, follow me, ask questions and I'll be happy to get back to you and also integrate common questions into future versions. Cheers! Andrew)
title: Funding Academy Express: How to Get Your Ideal Investor
